replies.message: Think words you're looking for is Rap God! ! Lol ;-)
Hah Eminem is a good rapper,but hes not the god of rap,the god of rap doesnt sing with bitches
king, pac is god of rap....know ur shit

Method, where the Gods at? Redman, where the squad at?//L, is that a mic on your arm? Let me borrow that//Who's the God of rap, you sayin' is nice//I beat a nigga to death, and beat a dead nigga to life//If you look at me long enough, I start to read your thoughts//If the signal was strong enough, and then I'll call your bluff//To see how many rhymes you got//I could go more millenia's than Mazda's got on a car lot//And there's no way to run ta' when I confront ya'//Nigga, I call your bluff, like it had a phone number//Who wanna see Canibus get wild?//Who wanna act fly and got shot down with surface to air missile//I take them on in all shapes, sizes, forms//And spit on, any MC's who ain't close enough to shit on//Zero to Sixty, I'm already doin' a hundred, when I'm blunted//And I give it to any nigga' that want it//Your head'll spin so fast, you'll catch whiplash//I practice, lyrical witchcraft, on your bitch ass//Make your hard drive crash to C colon backslash//Then I'll go back to the roots and school your whack ass//'Cause the object of the game, is to spark every cell in your brain//At degrees hotter than blue-flames//Propane gasses, incinerate you into ashes//I got you breathing harder than girls at Lamaze classes//Stop bitchin' about if its written or freestyle//Got the whole Spanish community saying im muy mal//Chargin' niggas with booty styles fifty dollar fines//In addition to twenty-five dollars for whack punchlines//'Cause I'm the top dog running the yard//And I represent, 'cause I'm never chained to the fence//Hence, to battle me is impossible//I your whole crew in the hospital, with I.V.'s in all their nostrils//So stop sleeping on me, I ain't a mattress//But you do more drama than a soap-opera actress//Don't even think pulling out and opening fire//Gun-shots wound, but I remove bullets with pliers//I inspired to kick that you've ever witnessed//From a far-side that's even confusing the fat lip//Rhymes designed from lines of pure knowledge//I make your head nod 'til your nexk runs out of cartilage//I think it's obvious that I can bring the ruckus//Scream at your crew like a military drill instructor//When I come through, niggas stand still in statues//If I have to, I'll battle your whole rap crew//Then I'll attack you with words that's absurd//And rip your fucking skin off, just to get on your nerves//

Yo Yo Honey Singh 
is the super bes rapper
www.tracksify.com
